overview: The SUPER SPEEDERS series captures the illicit world of street racing with real, uncensored footage of expensive sports cars tearing it up on the roadways of America. This volume takes a coast-to-coast tour of the country with an impressive array of high-octane vehicles like the SLR McLaren, Pagani Zonda, Lamborghini Gallardo, and 850HP Corvette.
title: Super Speeders 2 - Across America
